preqs: Students must have passed one of the following before undertaking this unit: MBA9006, MBA5906, MKX5461, MKF5461, MKX9160, MKF5916, MKX5955 or MKX9550.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MBA5906, MBA9006, MKF5916, MKX5461, MKX5955, MKX9160, MKX9550} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}

description: The relationship marketing model; 'internal marketing' and collaborative work practices; processes for closing the 'service quality gap' including problem solving and opportunity seeking on an on-going basis.
